function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Trust in science predicts compliance with COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Increased compliance leads to better control of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote and enhance trust in science and scientific recommendations","Technologies":"Public health communication strategies, educational campaigns","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations, government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Fear of COVID-19 associated with increased compliance","Impact":"Increased compliance reduces the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Address and alleviate fear through public health messaging and support systems","Technologies":"Mental health support services, public awareness campaigns","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations, government, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Economic endowments influence compliance with stay-at-home measures","Impact":"Influences the effectiveness of stay-at-home policies in controlling contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide targeted economic aid to enhance compliance with stay-at-home measures","Technologies":"Economic support programs, financial assistance initiatives","People":"Economically vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government, local authorities, community support organizations"}]}
